9. cp - copy files and directories
上一页 第 19 章 Directory and File System Related 下一页

9. cp - copy files and directories

9.1. copy directories recursively

cp -r /etc/* ~/myetc

9.2. overwrite an existing file

# alias cp
alias cp='cp -i'

# unalias cp
# alias cp
-bash: alias: cp: not found
